name: Pro Bocce 2018
description:
Ultra-realistic physics, beautiful sceneries and different balls with their own characteristics make Pro Bocce the most realistic Bocce/Petanque simulation.

-Multiplayer mode : play against friend on same device
-Hyper-intuitives controls
-Point or shoot
-Throw sitting or standing
-Make lobs
-Choose amongst 6 sceneries and 6 balls


Game in English
